about_the_game:
If you craved badly for The Incredible Adventures of Van Helsing but you wanted to try it out first, your chance has come!

In the demo, players can explore the wilderness of Borgovia with the Hunter, the Thaumaturge, or the Arcane Mechanic. They may differ in their methods, but their goal is common: slaying hundreds of foes lurking in the forests.
